answers.answer: Could be diabetes. Idk if you can develop it after the test but I don't see why not. May want to check with your Dr.
I will definitely ask my doctor  thank you!

I'm the same way... feels like my mouth is dry even right after I drink :( I asked my dr about it and he said it was common late in pregnancy, and if water doesnt help to drink gatoraid or poweraid. Good luck
I'm feeling the exact same way! I'm also 35 weeks today! How weird. Hahaha
I'm 35 weeks and I do the same thing! I wake up in the middle of the night to pee and go chug apple juice right from the jug! Sooooo thirsty all the time!
I get up and drink a full bottle of water! I'm glad Im not alone!

question: I have been gulping down cups of water and Im still thirsty! Can anyone tell me what this means? I'm 35 weeks today.
title: i cant get enough to drink!
